summary: Tested fixes for 3 reported issues: 1) Services showing on appointments page - FIXED, 2) App icon for mobile home screen - FIXED, 3) App name showing 'Natural Healing Lab' instead of 'emergent' - FIXED. All 17 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend appointments page correctly displays services from API.

issues: React hydration warning: nested <a> tags in NavigationMenu - minor, does not affect functionality (carried over from previous iterations)
Console warning: 'Encountered two children with the same key' - minor React key warning, does not affect functionality

critical_code_review_comments: AppointmentsPage.js correctly fetches services from /api/services endpoint (line 30-48)
Services with null IDs are filtered out in the UI (line 228: services.filter(service => service.id))
manifest.json has correct name 'Mother Natural: The Healing Lab' and short_name 'Natural Healing Lab'
All PWA icons (favicon.ico, logo192.png, logo512.png, apple-touch-icon.png) are present and accessible
index.html has correct title and Apple PWA meta tags for mobile home screen
seed_data_creation: Existing service 'Updated Service' (90 min, $100) with valid ID in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: Three issues were fixed and verified: 1) AppointmentsPage now fetches services from /api/services API instead of localStorage - services created in admin panel now appear on public appointments page, 2) manifest.json updated with correct app name 'Mother Natural: The Healing Lab' and purple theme color #a78bfa, 3) All PWA icon files generated and accessible (favicon.ico, logo192.png, logo512.png, apple-touch-icon.png). Admin login works with admin@mothernatural.com / Aniyah13. Services tab in admin panel shows 'Updated Service' correctly.

services_api_tests.details: All 6 tests passed: GET /api/services returns 200, returns list, services have valid IDs, services have required fields, create service returns valid ID, existing service has valid data

manifest_and_icons_tests.details: All 8 tests passed: manifest.json accessible, has correct name, has icons, has theme color, favicon.ico accessible, logo192.png accessible, logo512.png accessible, apple-touch-icon.png accessible

index_html_tests.details: All 3 tests passed: index.html accessible, has correct title 'Mother Natural: The Healing Lab', has Apple PWA meta tags

appointments_page_ui.details: Services load from API, 'Updated Service' displayed with 90 min duration and $100 price, service card clickable

admin_services_tab.details: Admin login works, Services tab shows 'Updated Service' with correct details, Add Service button visible

issue_1_services_not_showing.verification: AppointmentsPage fetches from /api/services, 'Updated Service' displays correctly on appointments page

issue_2_app_icon_black_box.verification: All icon files (favicon.ico, logo192.png, logo512.png, apple-touch-icon.png) exist and are accessible via HTTP 200

issue_3_app_name_emergent.verification: manifest.json name='Mother Natural: The Healing Lab', short_name='Natural Healing Lab', index.html title correct
